long_description: The Handlebar Console straps between the sides of your BOB single-stroller handlebar and keeps your water bottles and other small items easily accessible as you run. Console has 2 water bottle holders and a zippered pocket to hold lip balm, keys or power gels secure. Rip-and-stick straps attach console to stroller handlebar.
short_description: The Handlebar Console straps between the sides of your BOB single-stroller handlebar and keeps your water bottles and other small items easily accessible as you run.
